id.description: Unique identifier for the engagement email

createdAt.description: Date and time when the engagement email was created

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the engagement email was last updated

archived.description: Indicates if the engagement email is archived or not

contacts.description: List of contacts associated with the engagement email

deals.description: List of deals associated with the engagement email

companies.description: List of companies associated with the engagement email

tickets.description: List of tickets associated with the engagement email
